name: Richard Mortis in No Stone Unturned
name_original: Richard Mortis in No Stone Unturned
description:
[Made for the second Game-in-a-Week Jam!]

An evil witch wielding a dark magic has wrought her curse over an abandoned kingdom to rezurrect its long deceased residents and subject them to her mind control.

But by fate, the soul of one skeleton was preserved and protected by an ethereal blessing. Now, Sir Richard Mortis, the last hero of the kingdom, must travel to the kingdom's depths to put a stop to the witch's insidious plans...

No Stone Unturned is a "stop-motion puzzle game", putting you in the control of an unarmed skeleton. Your only defense is strategy. Monsters only move when you do. Consider each step you take beforehand, and you will make it through.
